#summary Compatibility
#labels Phase-Requirements

= Compatibility =

Plugin Template is compatible with:

 * *Operative Systems:*
       * Microsoft Windows (7 - compiled and tested)
       * Linux (Ubuntu - compiled and tested)

 * *Engines:*
       * Original / Episode 1
       * Dark Messiah
       * Orange Box / Episode 2
       * Orange Box Valve / Episode 2
       * Left 4 Dead
       * Left 4 Dead 2
       * Alien Swarm

_MACOS not tested_
